cases.title: Biomechanics Expert Witness Testimony Limited
cases.description: Defendant's Biomechanics Expert Witness could only testify on how accident occurred, and not to the injuries sustained.

cases.title: Eastern District Court Exclude's Defendant's Handwriting Expert Witness
cases.description: Defendant's Handwriting Expert Witness could not testify as his opinion was already contained in reports submitted to the court.

cases.title: Police Procedures Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Pursuit Case
cases.description: Because of his background, Plaintiff's Police Procedures Expert Witness was allowed to testify on defendant's alleged excessive force.
